title: Is janna immune to nerfs
body: I'm not asking for her to be nerfed or buffed. I dont want to discuss her balance but shes had a 53-54% win rate and a high play rate for as long as ive been playing this game.

replies.body: Fun fact: Janna is actually the champion with the most nerfs recieved in league

I'm pretty sure Alistar has gotten more

I distinctively remember him getting nerfed in like 10-15 different patches

But I could be wrong

Well technically all the old first 25 or so champions have received the most nerfs in the game.

In my memory Jax has  seen the most direct and indirect changes of any champion in the game. As he is a kit which relies heavy on items and he has seen items he is good with be removed and changed out the wazoo for as long as i can remember (7 years of playing). I mean he was like the first rework ever for instance.
#neverforget90percentdodgechancejax{{champion:24}}
I was only just getting good at jax when they removed that. XD

and yet she barly ever dropped below 53% winrate in plat+, and if she did, it only was for one patch.
Kinda tells that her kit is broken beyond numbers.
they also nerfed the utility of her Q

They can nerf that utillity all they want, as long as it has even 0.01sec of a knockup it will interupt mobillity tools and thus be very strong in the hands of a good player.
Unless her instant cast Q no longer has any knockup(which would be a change to her mechanics rather than numbers), she will remain beeing a hard counter to nearly all melees in the game
Best way to counteract that is to change the lower charge times of her Q to not knock up but to slow target. So no more instant knock ups by double tapping Q.
because she presses a button and makes melee champs useless. simple. and she has no *skillcap* you just shield ppl and afk

> [{quoted}](name=dominusx,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=mbFKmAcJ,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-12-16T15:52:19.741+0000)
>
> because she presses a button and makes melee champs useless. simple. and she has no *skillcap* you just shield ppl and afk

i main adc and i kind of think its fucking stupid how easy it is for her to get an assassin off me

Step 1: "insert support name in caps lock" IS OP, NURF
Step 2: OMG SOMEONE PLAY SUPPORT, FUCKING AUTOFILL THX RITO

> [{quoted}](name=Verdade,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=mbFKmAcJ,comment-id=000000000001,timestamp=2016-12-16T16:41:42.210+0000)
>
> Step 1: "insert support name in caps lock" IS OP, NURF
> Step 2: OMG SOMEONE PLAY SUPPORT, FUCKING AUTOFILL THX RITO

Yep. What do these people want? Do they want supports to be relevant and useful or be irrlevant, useless, and replaced by mages (causing even more whining)? 

The same people who hate playing support are often the ones crying to nerf supports. "Oh, Janna OP cuz she stopped my instagib!" No she's not OP. She's not stomping face. She's not going 24/0. Don't attribute lack of pick and play skills to a champ being OP. She does no damage, and is squishy as hell. All she has is utility. You take that away and she's useless.
Her skill cap is shielding to block poke in lane. Takes a little bit of practice, but still not too hard.

Her actual skillcap is Q zoning objectives, and Ult usage other than just simple "go away" button.
I beleive it was Adrian earlier this year, used Janna ult from dragon pit to push and lock someone against a wall that was near tri-bush over the wall so their team could get the kill.


But no, keep thinking that pressing R or E is the cap of Janna skill.

Now that you say it...
Knowing when to use R is definitely important. It can fuck up team fights hard. Predicting max charge Q is an important part of her kit, too.
I've used R to push an enemy Annie into my Nidalee's spear lol. Nid got the kill, was pretty epic

At one point in an aram i tried to janna ult away an enemy blitz, but i was too late and pushed him into his turret. His hook brought my teammate with him giving him the fadeaway. 

ummm lag? sure lag.

She has very little offensive options. In order to set up really good ganks she'd have to land a max Q. Ever since the utility scaling that plagued supports in S4? s5? her only offensive tool that was really good was her W.

Her Q and E cost a lot of mana to use consistently so if she is spamming them she will eventually have to run out. If you are diving the ADC instead of Janna you are doing it wrong. Janna has to choose to defend herself or the ADC and can only do it once every 6 seconds (not including her ult). 

You focus her down just like you would Sona or Soraka. Janna is just good at punishing people who want to 1 vs 2.

Janna has a high skill cap but low skill floor. Put her in the hands of someone who knows what spells the adc can and can't take and she's a monster.  She is the support for disengaging and she does it well.

She's been nerfed plenty of times in the past. Her kit is just too good at peeling to make her irrelevant.

In no particular order
1) Shorter tornado charge = less distance
2) Shield no longer gives AD if shield is broken
3) The stun after being knocked back with her ult is a little bit less (.75 > .5)
4) Howling Gale lost some width
5) Lost global MS passive. Lost MS in aura passive (now only works if you move towards her)
6) Janna's MS from W is now lost when W is on CD
7) AD bonus from shield nerfed across all ranks
8) Janna W now has static 12s CD instead of descending 1s with each rank
9) AP ratio on R nerfed
10) Knock up time is less if you charged less (Pretty sure this one was added, can't be sure tho)
11) Her ult used to slow after the knockback (thanks ByTheBeardOfZeus)
Her ult used to slow enemies inside it after the knockback part.
She used to be an extra helping of broken

> [{quoted}](name=Are,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=mbFKmAcJ,comment-id=0011,timestamp=2016-12-16T16:54:23.002+0000)
>
> 4) Howling Gale lost some width


SOME width? it used to be like twice as wide.

Oh look an assassin managed to actually skillfully flank and catch me/a carry off guard.
It would be a shame ifâ€¦ I pressed R.

Maybe if the assassin was more skillful they would have played around the Janna pick and either nuked somebody Janna wasn't protecting or waited until Janna burned her ultimate to stop, say, a teammates engage.  You can't play the same way in every game with every champion and expect the same results, sometimes there are other factors you have to consider.

Its an ult so this really isnt an issue... Shes blowing her ult to save a life. Its no worse that what Kayle or Taric do other than you get pushed away. At least your ranges teammates can still melt the target.
Because when a Janna and Vayne win a 2v3 people don't see it as Janna being op they only see the Vayne that just "3v1"ed
It's pretty sad how supps go unnoticed
Janna is actually apparently one of the most nerfed champions in the game along with Ezreal
BEEN CRYING ABOUT JANNA OP SINCE SEASON 3 BUT NOOOOOOOOOOO RIOT DOESN'T CARE
Yeah, nerf supports so that mains stop playing them, everyone gets autofilled into support and dodges because supports aren't relevant. Infinite queues everywhere
Good thing she isnt also immune to bans hehe xd

Janna will always be strong due to the nature and mindset of a majority of the playerbase that feels they need to think in a one directional manner of kill kill kill. Her kit by nature is about denying those kills. Until we see a shift in mind set of players, Janna will always be strong.

In other words, Janna isn't really the problem here. Could you consider her freelo? Sure. But that's more the fault of the players playing against Janna. Not Janna herself.

Thank you! 
This is why people complain about my Raka. ;_;
pretty sure she had more nerfs than any other champ in the game.

Remember when Sona was deemed "freelo", because she synergized well in a poke heavy ADC meta?
Or when Soraka was "freelo", because she synergized well with a caster ADC meta?
Or Nunu nerfed out of support when Kog hypercarry was meta.
And now Janna is the "freelo", because she works well at protecting current meta hypercarries from the ever so frequent tower divers.

It's not hard to make the connection on what's really broken here, rather than the support of the month.

> Remember when Sona was deemed "freelo", because she synergized well in a poke heavy ADC meta?

She was deemed freelo because she hit a fucking 57% win rate with the changes.

Uhh you mean the champ that even Riot said they cant balance without breaking? Yeah that champ?

Yeah because nunu didnt hit a 56% win rate

> And now Janna is the "freelo", because she works well at protecting current meta hypercarries from the ever so frequent tower divers.
> 
> It's not hard to make the connection on what's really broken here, rather than the support of the month.

Except janna has been freelo for 3 years now.

No

No

fuck no.
 You have no idea what you're talking about

I can literally guarentee you are a support main who just wants to bitch.

- "The cause of death was asphyxiation."
 - "You're wrong. The cause of death is because he died."

> [{quoted}](name=Rozzeta,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=mbFKmAcJ,comment-id=001500000000,timestamp=2016-12-16T20:50:28.832+0000)
>
> - "The cause of death was asphyxiation."
>  - "You're wrong. The cause of death is because he died."

Lol'd hard at this.

Partially because I had a teacher that was a dick, he would always say:
"**You're all wrong, the real cause of death was a heart attack**" and we would be like "WTF?", his argument was that the definition of "cessation of life" in humans is defined as the "**cessation of functioning of the cardiopulmonary system**" which is actually true. So literally every single human dies of a "heart attack" or more precisely , a stopped heart, whether it be through  hypovolemic shock or .... well basically it's always hypovolemic shock. It always come down to that.

Etc. the above quoted was funny.

Well, she does charge 2.95 a minute to take your breath away.

She is a versatile support who can either rock Spell thief or Amulet Coin.  One of my favorite things to do is actually split push with Janna. The enemy doesn't usually just send the support to deal with it, but one of the damage dealers or multiple people. So I pull aggro and can still effectively run away by using my abilities and item cds while my team punishes another lane or objective. Janna is fun and works well with many adcs.
apparently anything windy and or wally is
Please head over to her patch notes history and read the long list of nerfs she's received since the beginning of time.

well if they nerfed her, she'd be pretty useless... those tornadoes are pretty hard to land since they come at you pretty slowly... the only way you can land those things is by surprise. If they nerfed her, what would she do? She'd just be a damageless shieldbot with a weak movement speed aura
Soooo, basically Lulu.

Lulu has plenty of damage with her Q and E and AAs :/
along with some tankiness with her ult 

she's totally unlike Janna :U

I actually looked out of curiosity. Janna has similar base/scalings to Lulu (Tornado depending on charge time). Lulu has less AD and AS, but the Pix passive makes up for it. Overall, their damage outputs are likely very similar based on kit alone. Lulu certainly would want more offense out of runes/masteries/items though, hence actually ending up dealing more in games where they follow standard builds for each.


They aren't exacy dissimilar anyhow.

You weren't around when they repeatedly kept trying to nerf Janna, but she kept being good anyway?

She has nothing but utility left now. If you gut her utility, something every support should have and excel at, then she literally does nothing. She's a passive support people have trouble dealing with, just leave her as is. Nerf her any more and she'll stop being played all together, which I thought was something we wanted to avoid having being done to champions.

Just a suposition here, but- shouldn't all 'viable' supports have an above average winrate, even if they're properly balanced?

People like to pick non-viable supports all the time, and to troll when they get forced to play support. Janna however is not a champion you can play off-meta, mostly only dedicated support players even own her, and she's impossible to mess up (you can just hang back and throw out sheilds, press R, and her speed means she'll can escape and not feed). The fact she's played in the role she was designed for has to have some effect on her winrate. Ontop of some of the other factors that've already been mentioned.

Janna is, in my opinion, increadibly weak. Her laning phase is trash, she's very reactive (not so proactive) and most Jannas I've seen can't hit a single tornado ALL game (no offense to the good players out there, there's just so many bad ones) But she's very on-meta, and I'd rather have a Janna than a Teemo. And I hate Janna.

Janna is under the radar cause her kit may not feel toxic, but anybody with a decent awarness knows shes overpowered. All she have to do is to press R to fuck over any meele champion that tries to kill her adc.
